text:
Stream | Amsterdam, The Netherlands ONSITE | https://getstream.io/careers | Software Engineer

Stream (https://getstream.io, Techstars NYC'15) is building a new kind of data store. A data store for building, scaling and personalizing feeds. Our users access Stream via a blazing fast, highly available and simple to use API service.

Stream runs on an infrastructure optimized for performance and availability. We are looking for an experienced software engineer to join our team in Amsterdam. You will work on great problems such as realtime, HA, high concurrency etc..

Reach out to me directly at tommaso@getstream.io if you're interested
